ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: Ty Blaen Torfaen, Panteg Way, New Inn

TITLE.P: General Building and Electrical Maintenance and Refurbishment Services and Works

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Framework encompasses all aspects of repair and maintenance of the buildings, including minor building and electrical works/projects such as alterations and refurbishments.
Maintenance activities are to be undertaken as follows:
a) Reactive / Responsive Maintenance (Corrective or Day-to-Day) is minor unplanned maintenance used for assets experiencing breakdown, failure or vandalism of a component.
b) Planned Maintenance Projects is to be used to comply with statutory requirements and for building fabric, structural components and renewal of time expired plant or components.
c) Refurbishment / Project Works is to be used to carry out improvements, upgrades, alterations and refurbishment of part or all of a structure encompassing all Lots or an element of each.
d) Cyclical Maintenance (Preventative, Statutory and Non-Statutory Servicing) is to be used to comply with statutory or manufacturer’s requirements and for building services.
General Building Maintenance and Refurbishment Services and Works.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: Option to extend for a further period of twelve months.

OBJECT_DESCR.EU_PROGR_RELATED: European Regional Development Fund (ERDF) and/or Rural Development Programme 2014-2020 (RDP) Projects
